name: com.unity.burst
description: Burst is a compiler that translates from IL/.NET bytecode to highly optimized native code using LLVM.

_upm.changelog:
### Added

### Removed

### Changed
- Changed minimum Editor version to 2022.3.

### Fixed
- Fixed Burst runtime Mac binaries not being signed.
- Fixed a bug where `Span<T>.Fill` used with spans of smaller-than-int integer types would cause out-of-bounds writes (leading to data corruption and segfaults)
